005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
013
014import java.util.Collections;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.Set;
018import java.util.stream.Collectors;
019
020import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023
024/**
025 * The default implementation of a constraint set sourced from an external
026 * constraint resource.
027 */
028public class DefaultConstraintSet implements IConstraintSet {
029  @NonNull
030  private final ISource source;
031  @NonNull
032  private final Set<IConstraintSet> importedConstraintSets;
033  @NonNull
034  private final Map<IEnhancedQName, List<IScopedContraints>> scopedContraints;
035
036  /**
037   * Construct a new constraint set.
038   *
039   * @param source
040   *          the resource the constraint was provided from
041   * @param scopedContraints
042   *          a set of constraints qualified by a scope path
043   * @param importedConstraintSets
044   *          constraint sets imported by this constraint set
045   */
046  @SuppressWarnings("null")
047  public DefaultConstraintSet(
048      @NonNull ISource source,
049      @NonNull List<IScopedContraints> scopedContraints,
050      @NonNull Set<IConstraintSet> importedConstraintSets) {
051    this.source = source;
052    this.scopedContraints = scopedContraints.stream()
053        .collect(
054            Collectors.collectingAndThen(
055                Collectors.groupingBy(
056                    scope -> IEnhancedQName.of(scope.getModuleNamespace().toString(), scope.getModuleShortName()),
057                    Collectors.toUnmodifiableList()),
058                Collections::unmodifiableMap));
059    this.importedConstraintSets = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableSet(importedConstraintSets);
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Get the resource the constraint was provided from.
064   *
065   * @return the resource
066   */
067  @Override
068  public ISource getSource() {
069    return source;
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Get the set of Metaschema scoped constraints to apply by a {@link QName}
074   * formed from the Metaschema namespace and short name.
075   *
076   * @return the mapping of QName to scoped constraints
077   */
078  @NonNull
079  public Map<IEnhancedQName, List<IScopedContraints>> getScopedContraints() {
080    return scopedContraints;
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public Set<IConstraintSet> getImportedConstraintSets() {
085    return importedConstraintSets;
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public Iterable<ITargetedConstraints> getTargetedConstraintsForModule(@NonNull IModule module) {
090    IEnhancedQName qname = module.getQName();
091
092    Map<IEnhancedQName, List<IScopedContraints>> map = getScopedContraints();
093    List<IScopedContraints> scopes = map.getOrDefault(qname, CollectionUtil.emptyList());
094    return CollectionUtil.toIterable(ObjectUtils.notNull(scopes.stream()
095        .flatMap(scoped -> scoped.getTargetedContraints().stream())));
096  }
097
098}
